mapper.update: update pms_product_offshelves set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_man = #{verifyMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, openid, product_id, reason, verify_man, time from pms_product_offshelves
